topics.body:
this is why i feel today´s internet age is the best thing that happened to music, artists are no longer forced to comply to oppresive record labels, you can become famous without being signed, experimentation is far more rewarded and easier to look

bands like death grips, shabazz palaces, CLIPPING, or rappers like denzel curry, LIL UGLY MANE or A$AP Rocky wouldnt have gotten the same chances of becoming famous in the 70´s 80´s or 90´s than the chances they had today.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc
